Method used to test if an object is a Falcon Model, View, or Collection.

object
The Object to test
var array = []; var object = new Falcon.Object(); var collection = new Falcon.Collection(); var model = new Falcon.Model(); var view = new Falcon.View(); console.log( Falcon.isFalconObject(array) );// => false console.log( Falcon.isFalconObject(object) );// => true console.log( Falcon.isFalconObject(model) );// => true console.log( Falcon.isFalconObject(collection) ); // => true console.log( Falcon.isFalconObject(view) );// => true
